shelfButtonInfos.label: Step Tangent
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the step mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Spline Tangent
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the spline mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Linear Tangent
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the linear mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Cycle Infinity
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Cycle Offset Infinity
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle with offset mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Linear Infinity
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the linear mode.

shelfButtonInfos.label: Easy In Easy Out
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set easy in and easy out.
